price: Anadwo no mu bi nso fa w’anim butu fͻm fama no, na fa anadwo no mu berε tenten tontom no.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَٱسۡجُدۡ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحۡهُ لَيۡلٗا طَوِيلًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamina al-layli fa-us'jud lahu wasabbiḥ'hu laylan ṭawīlan
